statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT scheduled_maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Monthly' LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, scheduled_maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency' AND equipment_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%enance%' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, scheduled_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id > 2 AND equipment_id <= 6;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task, task_frequency FROM maintenance_schedule
SELECT * FROM equipment_downtime WHERE downtime_reason = 'Machine Malfunction'
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date >= '2022-11-01'
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task, task_frequency FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_task LIKE '%plumbing%'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 123;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE task_frequency = 'monthly' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_task, task_frequency FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(downtime_id) AS downtime_count FROM equipment_downtime GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY downtime_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_downtime WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, task_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, start_date, end_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM maintenance_record WHERE technician_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, start_date, end_date, task_description FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, task_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_id FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completed_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment_downtime ORDER BY downtime_start DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, scheduled_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_logs.notes FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.id = maintenance_logs.maintenance_id WHERE maintenance_logs.technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completed_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment_downtime WHERE reason LIKE '%maintenance%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, downtime_start, downtime_end, downtime_reason FROM downtime_log ORDER BY downtime_start DESC;
SELECT technician_name, hire_date, contact_number FROM technician WHERE technician_specialty = 'Electrical';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, downtime_start, downtime_end, downtime_reason FROM downtime_log WHERE downtime_reason LIKE '%maintenance%';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty, hire_date FROM technician WHERE technician_specialty = 'Electrical' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
